#uSecurity

## Functions and levels

[function](http://tumregels.github.io/Network-Programming-with-Go/security/iso_security_architecture.html)

## データ整合性

```console
go run dataIntegrity/main.go
b1946ac9 2492d234 7c6235b4 d2611184
```

## 対象鍵暗号

```console
go run symmetric/main.go
hello
```

## X.509証明書

```console
cd X509KeyGen && go run ../publicKeyGen/main.go && go run main.go && go run ../X509KeyRead/main.go
Private key primes 112444116414991432276691352609187541062504202483907687033235282459462607464591 96541302968600930026883796898649008681576098611153032206971545779049689240941

Not before 2017-12-26 01:14:16 +0000 UTC
Not after 2018-12-26 01:14:16 +0000 UTC
```
